resources.string:
Learn Any Languages with fun mini-lessons
that feel like games! Use the free app
every day to quickly improve your
spoken Languages.
Build an entertaining habit: learn as much or as little as you want. You only need 10 minutes a day to improve. Perfect for making your loo break a lot more fun.
It\'s fun! Advance by completing bite-sized lessons, and track your progress with shiny achievements.
